nodes.text: Rebel Rescues is a hardcover children's activity book that invites readers to create their own Star Wars battle scenes using sixteen magnets. The book includes five scenes and scenarios adapted from the young-reader stories The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure, Moving Target: A Princess Leia Adventure, Smuggler's Run: A Han Solo & Chewbacca Adventure from Disney–Lucasfilm Press and the comic series Star Wars: Chewbacca from Marvel Comics. It was adapted by Sally Little and published by Studio Fun International on October 9, 2018.
